about_the_game:
POCKET QUEST is a tactical auto-battler where you enlist warriors, monsters, knights—did we mention DEMONS—to fight the teams of other players. Explore combinations that work well together, and come up with your own strategy!

Each round, you gain Gold. Save it up to recruit better heroes, or fill your team quickly to overwhelm your opponent—the choice is yours! However, don’t wait too long, as heroes are limited. Get 'em before your enemies do. Collect multiple of the same type, merge them and unlock powerful abilities. That’s right, the heroes are more than one-trick ponies. Actually, there are no ponies in the game, at all. Sorry.

Heroes come in 8 alignment directions. While heroes of the same direction work well together, the circle allows for creative combinations even of opposites. Blend heroes from different alignments, experiment with neighbouring heroes, and craft a team that reflects your cunning and ingenuity!

Once the recruit timer runs out, your heroes charge into battle against the team of another player. Witness the spectacle as your heroes unleash their abilities and combos automatically. Brace yourself for the heart-pounding rhythm of victory and defeat!

Enter competitive leagues and claw your way to the top, or if you prefer, battle against your friends. We’re not judging. Your friends are probably easy marks and you secretly enjoy stomping them. With each hard-fought battle, you’ll inch closer to the coveted top spot, as you amass Ranking Points and fight people on par in the Leagues. Win badges, stickers and cosmetics to customise your player tag. Top players get a spotlight, so you want to look your best.

Wishlist Now! Seamlessly transition between Steam and mobile, with your progress always at your fingertips. Whether you’re on a quest during your commute or at home, the adventure never stops – play anytime, anywhere.
